content.question: Write a statement that uses the String method substring to extract the first name from email and assign it to a variable. Write another statement that uses the String method substring to extract the last name from email and assign it to a variable. Then use the results of those statements to create and assign the correct value to a String variable for username 1.

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
